data.title: Meeting with Celebrities
data.meta_description: Meeting with Celebrities. Click on Thumbnails below for larger images which are all available in higher resolution. You can download higher resolution images (400 dpi JPG, 4-5MB) of most of these photos from the National Archives Catalog.
data.text:
Click on Thumbnails below for larger images which are all available in higher resolution. You can download higher resolution images (400 dpi JPG, 4-5MB) of most of these photos from the National Archives Catalog. For use of Reagan Library audiovisual materials please read the AV disclaimer.

Order Form

Order Information and Pricing

Main White House Photograph Collection Galleries Page

C559-30, President Reagan cutting in on Nancy Reagan and Frank Sinatra dancing at the President's birthday party in the east room. 02/06/1981.

C658-24, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan meeting actress Cicely Tyson at the Harlem Dance Theatre at the Kennedy Center, Washington, DC. 02/10/1981.

C927-11, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan talking with Bob Hope during the State Dinner for Prime Minister Thatcher at the White House. 02/26/1981.

C1199-11A, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan with Mickey Rooney and Ann Miller backstage at performance of "Sugar Babies" at Mark Hellinger Theatre in New York city. 03/14/1981.

C1209-30, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan meeting with Jerry Lewis and the Muscular Dystrophy poster child Christi Bartlett in the oval office. 03/16/1981.

C1267-28, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan talking to actress Elizabeth Taylor after the Performance of "Little Foxes" at John F. Kennedy Center in Washington, DC. 03/19/1981.

C1295-7, President Reagan greeting actress Lynda Carter at a Reception for Ford's Theatre Gala in cross hall. 03/21/1981.

C1297-24, David Copperfield performing magic for the Reagan's and Tip O'Neill and Mildred. O'Neill during the Ford's Theatre Gala "The Stars Salute the President" in Washington, DC. 03/21/1981.

C1299-14, Ford's Theatre Gala, "The Stars Salute the President," with Victoria Principal, Tony Bennett, Lynda Carter, Rodney Dangerfield, Luciano Pavarotti, Lena Horne, Itzhak. Perlman, David Copperfield, Johnny Cash, June Cash, Jack Klugman, George Benson, Loretta Lynn, Dom Deluise, Twyla Tharp, Juliet Prowse, Andy Gibb, Chris Cross, Natalia Makarova, Andy Williams. 03/21/1981.

C1299-30A, President Reagan addressing the crowd during Ford's Theatre Gala, "The Stars Salute the President," with Nancy Reagan, Tony Bennett, Lynda Carter, Rodney Dangerfield, Luciano Pavarotti, Jack Klugman, Victoria Principal, and George Benson. 03/21/1981.

C1748-3, President Reagan talking with actress Audrey Hepburn and Robert Wolders at a private dinner for the Prince of Wales in the White House residence. 05/02/1981.

C1748-22, Nancy Reagan and Prince Charles talking with actor Cary Grant and Barbara Grant at a private dinner for the Prince of Wales in the White House residence. 05/02/1981.

C2150-9A, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan with James Cagney during a trip to United States Military Academy at West Point, New York. 05/27/1981.

C2232-34, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan receiving a baseball from Frank Sinatra during a meeting with the 1981 National Multiple Sclerosis Society Mother and Father of the Year in the oval office. 06/03/1981.

C2456-24, President Reagan with Charlton Heston at a meeting with the Presidential Task Force on the Arts and Humanities in the cabinet room. 06/15/1981 .

C2538-16, Nancy Reagan greeting singer Lena Horne with Ron Reagan in New York city. 06/17/1981

C2733-18, President Reagan meeting with 1981 Miss Universe Shawn Weatherly and 1981 Miss USA Kim Seel Brede in the oval office. 06/30/1981.

C2758-21A, President Reagan greeting singer Olivia Newton-John at State Dinner for Prime Minister Fraser of Australia. 06/30/1981.

C3215-6, President Reagan talking to actor Sylvester Stallone with his wife Sasha Czack and Joan Clark during a White House party and film "Victory" showing in the red room. 07/24/1981.

C3250-33, President Reagan photo opportunity with native american Iron Eyes Cody and gift presentation in the oval office. 07/28/1981.

C3326-14A, Nancy Reagan posing with actor Douglas Fairbanks, Jr. and Grace Kelly (Peter McCoy at far left) during a dinner at Winfield House during trip to London for the Royal Wedding. 07/26/1981.

C3552-11A, President Reagan talking with Charlton Heston, Lydia Heston, Ricardo Montalban and Georgina Montalban at a Dinner at Bloomingdale residence in Beverly Hills, California. 08/19/1981.

C3978-33, President Reagan greeting Sammy Davis Jr., and Tony Orlando at a Dinner in Honor of President Gerald Ford at the Amway Grand Plaza Hotel in Grand Rapids, Michigan. 09/17/1981.

C4495-9A, President Reagan with Ella Fitzgerald after her performance for King Juan Carlos I of Spain in the east room. 10/13/1981.

C4642-16A, Nancy Reagan talking with actress Helen Hayes in the yellow oval room. 10/20/1981.

C5409-18A, Nancy Reagan talking with actors Warren Beatty and Diane Keaton in the east colonnade for a movie screening for "Reds" in the Family Theater. 12/05/1981.

C5410-11A, President Reagan talking with actors Cary Grant and Douglas Fairbanks Jr. at a White House private dinner party in the yellow oval room. 12/04/1981.

C5412-17A, Nancy Reagan shaking hands with singer Ella Fitzgerald at a Kennedy Center Honors Reception in the blue room. 12/06/1981.

C5415-8, Nancy Reagan shaking hands with actress Sissy Spacek at a Kennedy Center Honors Reception in the blue room. 12/06/1981.

C5415-27, Nancy Reagan shaking hands with actress Meryl Streep at a Kennedy Center Honors Reception in the blue room. 12/06/1981.

C5415-28, Nancy Reagan shaking hands with actor Richard Chamberlain at a Kennedy Center Honors Reception in the blue room. 12/06/1981.

C5416-19A, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan greet actor Donald Sutherland at the Kennedy Center Honors Reception in blue room. 12/06/1981.
